events.message: I received my recent order today, but unfortunately the laptop screen is damaged with several visible scratches and does not turn on properly.
The reported issue involves a defective product, specifically a damaged and faulty laptop screen.
Assigning the case to the technical support team for further assistance regarding the defective laptop screen issue.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the scratches and malfunction with your laptop screen. I’m here to help resolve this.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged screen and let us know when you received the package so we can expedite the process?
I have attached the photos showing the scratches and the screen failing to power on. The package was delivered yesterday afternoon.
Thank you for the details. We will arrange a replacement laptop to be shipped immediately and provide instructions for returning the defective unit at no extra cost.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to replace the laptop. That sounds good to me, thank you.
The replacement order has been processed and shipped. You will receive tracking details shortly, and a prepaid label for the defective laptop return is included.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is functioning properly now.
Yes, the new laptop arrived yesterday and works perfectly. Thanks again for your help and quick resolution.
We are glad that your issue is resolved. Closing this case, and please contact us again if you need further assistance.
